properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF
ASSISTANCE IN 33-34N 011-58E. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
